name: Push Maze Puzzle
description:
With simply pushing buttons and slide, solve the puzzles.
Clear stage missions and challenge higher levels.

[Game Features]
- 3 control types supported.
- User convenience feature (reset and undo) supported.
- Replay supported (activated for stages cleared)
- Multiplayer Mode: compete with your rivals.
- Supportive Items that helps players to solve challenging missions.
- Mini-game mode: enjoy simple and unique missions!
- Simple and stylized graphic designs.
- 16 languages supported.
- Achievement & leaderboard supported
- Smart pads & Tablet devices supported
